items.title: Marketing Technology Market Size to worth USD 1,769.49 Bn by 2032, Growing at 17.3% CAGR, Coherent Market Insights
items.author: Coherent Market Insights
items.description: The global marketing technology market is expected to grow from $579.11 billion in 2025 to $1,769.49 billion by 2032, driven by rapid digital transformation and increasing adoption of AI-powered marketing tools. However, high costs and regulatory challenges are limiting market growth.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: Salesforce is mentioned as a key player in the marketing technology market, and the company's recent launch of new marketing and commerce innovations is expected to contribute to the industry's growth.

Adobe is also highlighted as a major player in the marketing technology market, and the company's recent unveiling of the Adobe Experience Platform Agent Orchestrator is seen as a positive development for the industry.
